articles.author: Christine Rendon, Amy Lamare
articles.title: Priyanka Chopra 'cried' to husband Nick Jonas after she was told she wasn't 'sample-sized' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Speaking at SXSW, Chopra said she 'cried' to her husband Nick Jonas after being on the receiving end of body shaming comments.
articles.content:
